name: drngcat
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(cfv(cringc, c0), cresc, c2), ccat))
-| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, co(cv(s0), crh, cv(s1))))

stmt.origin: sringcat(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, cdr, c3)

comment: The restriction of the category of (unital) rings to the set of division ring homomorphisms is a category, the "category of division rings". (Contributed by AV, 20-Feb-2020.)
